title: MPs visit Ven. Ittapane Dhammalankara Thera
body_lines: Dissident government MPs including Wimal Weerawansa, Udaya Gammanpila, Gevindu Kumaratunga and Ven. Athureliye Ratana Thera met with the Mahanayaka of Kalyani Samagri Sangha Sabah's Ittapane Dhammalankara Thera at the Rukmale Dharamavijayaloka Viharya today. The MPs handed over a copy of the proposal prepared by them to build up the nation. Pix by Pradeep Dilrusksana
